title: LeaverBuster Unfair 20 Minute Penalties
body: So lately, Riot hasn't considered the fact that I can't have the perfect internet connection and that I would be disconnecting a lot in a week. I want Riot to simply remove my penalties and make an exception where people who have troublesome internet connections cannot receive penalties because you can't put  the blame on them for disconnecting, blame the network that can crash at any time and I keep trying to remove these LeaverBuster matches but I always get em because **RIOT ISN'T LENIENT ENOUGH FOR THE UNFORTUNATE PEOPLE** so I pretty much suffer nearly every week to this crap. I just want you to fix this for me and not have to receive any penalties for no real good reason.

replies.body:
Well when my net isn't doing so well, I simply don't play League, if you are playing with full knowledge that your internet could be bad at any time you should invest in a better connection.

"not have to receive any penalties for no real good reason"
As implied above, you shouldn't play games if you expect or think you will disconnect.
